survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of the Annual Tech Innovation Conference to improve future events.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown for answer options.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the conference?

questions.question_text: Which session(s) did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select. Randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: Which session(s) did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What could be improved for future conferences?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What could be improved for future conferences?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend next year's conference?
questions.client_notes: 5-point scale for measurable intent. Include 'Undecided' midpoint.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend next year's conference?

questions.question_text: What topics would you like to see covered in future conferences?
questions.client_notes: Open-text to identify emerging trends. Tag responses for thematic analysis.

script.question_text: What topics would you like to see covered in future conferences?
